advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.short: Watch videos without ads with Premium. Try it free for one month.
Create videos with ease and express your style with stickers.

editorialNotes.standard: Before Canva came along, you had to invest in some pretty serious software (and have some pretty serious skills) to create even simple graphics. But with tens of thousands of templates and nearly unlimited ways to customize them, Canva has democratized design. With this easy-to-use app, you can master logos, posters, and invitations in minutes, not months.
editorialNotes.short: Quickly create posts for social media or your small business.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: From its humble origin as a fun way to send self-erasing photo messages, Snapchat has grown into one of our favorite social media apps. And not just for the hilarious face filters and cool geographical photo tags. It’s become one of the best ways to share memories, maintain friendships, and stay up to date on news and views from our go-to websites.
editorialNotes.short: Share the moment.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: We love watching live streams of League of Legends, Roblox and everything in between. And there’s more to Twitch than games. The Travel and Outdoors category (you’ll find it in the Browse tab) has live animal cams. There’s even an entire channel dedicated to painter and teacher (and master of happy little trees) Bob Ross.
editorialNotes.short: Broadcast, watch, chat and have fun.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Level up your photo and video game with the all-in-one editor and collage maker Picsart. A quick snap or selfie can be supercharged with tools, filters, stickers and more—making it easy to create masterpieces and discover others doing the same. Whether you are trying to remove a background or seeking a total transformation of your Photos library’s finest, tapping into your creativity and whipping up scroll-stopping content has never been more fun.
editorialNotes.short: Your all-in-one creativity suite for photo editing.

editorialNotes.standard: Adobe Photoshop brings everything that defines the iconic desktop photo editor to iOS and iPadOS, complete with customizable interfaces optimized for touch (and Apple Pencil). Unlimited layers, precise editing tools, cutting-edge AI features to transform your images and workflow—they’re all here.

Adobe Lightroom is an essential tool for any discerning photographer. Its sleek interface and robust tools transform potato-quality images into stunning works of art with a few taps. And the best part? It’s nondestructive, giving you the freedom to experiment with all the controls without damaging the original photo.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Adobe Express is the easiest way for anyone to become a graphic design guru. With hundreds of gorgeous templates, the app lets you quickly mock up and share invites, announcements, social media posts, and more with just a few taps. And with the app’s membership, you also get access to a library of fonts and stock photos that will take your design skills to the next level.
editorialNotes.short: Create social-ready graphics using loads of built-in templates and preset sizes.

ios.subtitle: A Quick and Pro Video Editor

editorialNotes.short: Decorate your memories with stickers or music with this fun editor.

editorialNotes.standard: If you’ve ever wondered why certain videos on social media look so much better than others, we can explain: It’s because the good ones are made with apps like Adobe Premiere Rush. One of our favorite features is one-click auto-duck audio mixing, which does not add quacking noises but rather automatically adjusts the volume of background music during voice-overs.

editorialNotes.short: Create beautiful stop-motion animated movies anywhere.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

Create your first film with Multi-Touch.
Have fun with filters, special design frames and collages for your best shots.

name: Cast Web Videos to TV - iWebTV

editorialNotes.short: From instant fix-ups to fine-tuned adjustments, everything you need is here.
Magically crop your photos for stunning creations!
Arrange photos from your album in stunning layouts using collage, stickers, and funny captions.
Polish your photos by playing around with great tools and filters.
editorialNotes.tagline: Focus on editing like a pro

editorialNotes.short: Use nostalgic film effects to give your photos more character.
Banish the blemish! Flaunt your flawless look.

editorialNotes.standard: There’s no task too big—or too small—for this robust photo editor. If you want to add some cool filters, you can. If you want to adjust the exposure, add some saturation, and make it ’gram-worthy, you can do that too. And if you’d rather draw than edit? You’re in luck. Affinity Photo packs support for Apple Pencil and an incredible array of basic and advanced illustration tools. Create unlimited layers, choose from an unsurprisingly enormous selection of brushes, and even create your own brushes—complete with jitter, spacing, and flow. (Sounds like dancing, right?)

editorialNotes.short: Capture every exciting moment and create action-packed clips.
Digitize your old albums.
One-of-a-kind photo gifts and unlimited free photo storage.

editorialNotes.standard: Like a good denim jacket, VSCO's got a coolness factor that can’t be measured. It isn’t just a set of perfectly made film-emulation presets and editing tools. It’s also a community of more than 30 million creators sharing and discovering their work—photography so striking it’ll make you wanna march outside and snap some of your own.
editorialNotes.short: With slow-motion video, you can capture the moments that flash by in stunning detail.
